Name: Beni
Description: Beni was a skilled chef and had a desire to entertain the guests with his flair for cooking and pizzazz. His work in a beloved restaurant was all he desired. However, due to some mismanagement of the business aspect of the restaurant it went under and Chef Beni was soon out of a job. He however was not out of luck as the founder saw Beni and loved his knack for entertaining people and believed he would be a wonderful addition to his gameshow. The founder offered Beni a chance at glory and winning prizes enough for him to open all the restaurants he wanted, thus began Beniâ€™s journey into the Soul Surivor gameshow.
